div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 548 Ad√Ænca, c. 12 km. E of Tirgoviste, Rumania, 1953 Burial: c. 110-100 B.C. Contents: 52 AR. Pot hoard Imit. Philip II: 46 tetradr. Thasos: 6 spread-flan tetradr. Disposition: Bucharest (Inst. Arch.) 23; Tirgoviste 23; Ploiesti 6 Preda, SCN 2 (1958), pp. 380-9, illus.
